text: WZLQ (98.5 FM), known as "Z-98-5", is a mainstream rock radio station based in Tupelo, Mississippi, and serves North Mississippi with ERP of 100,000 watts at 98.5 MHz. "Z-98-5" is owned by the Mississippi Radio Group.http://www.msradiogroup.com/ The station is the former WELO-FM. ==References== ==External links== * ZLQ
title: WZLQ
